General.Name: Chord Energy Corp
General.Description: Chord Energy Corporation operates as an independent exploration and production company. It acquires, exploits, develops, and explores for crude oil, natural gas, and natural gas liquids in the Williston Basin. Chord Energy Corporation was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Houston, Texas.
General.Address: 1001 Fannin Street, Houston, TX, United States, 77002
